body:
Before, make plugins delivered:
pf@lbfb:~/Projects/OpenSource/grpc_cross_compile/grpc$ make plugins
[HOSTLD]  Linking /home/pf/Projects/OpenSource/grpc_cross_compile/grpc/bins/opt/grpc_cpp_plugin
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible libs/opt/libz.a when searching for -lz
/home/pf/Projects/OpenSource/grpc_cross_compile/grpc/objs/opt/src/compiler/cpp_plugin.o: In function `std::vector<int, std::allocator<int> >::push_back(int const&)':
/usr/include/c++/4.9/bits/stl_vector.h:923: undefined reference to `google::protobuf::FileDescriptorProto::kSyntaxFieldNumber'
/usr/include/c++/4.9/bits/stl_vector.h:923: undefined reference to `google::protobuf::FileDescriptorProto::kSyntaxFieldNumber'
/home/pf/Projects/OpenSource/grpc_cross_compile/grpc/objs/opt/src/compiler/cpp_plugin.o:(.data.rel.ro._ZTV16CppGrpcGenerator[_ZTV16CppGrpcGenerator]+0x14): undefined reference to `google::protobuf::compiler::CodeGenerator::GenerateAll(std::vector<google::protobuf::FileDescriptor const*, std::allocator<google::protobuf::FileDescriptor const*> > const&, std::string const&, google::protobuf::compiler::GeneratorContext*, std::string*) const'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
Makefile:13812: recipe for target '/home/pf/Projects/OpenSource/grpc_cross_compile/grpc/bins/opt/grpc_cpp_plugin' failed

That seems to be more of a protobuf issue than a grpc issue. Another better way is to cross-compile protobuf and provide it externally instead of relying on the built-in build system we have. You may have better luck that way, and maybe even more insights of what the actual issue is.
